reviewText: I agree with other reviews that art work is brilliant......message is sort of clear and very repetitive. If you are advanced in spiritual pactices you will not benefit a lot....but it is my personal opinion.

This is a truly work of art, not just for the amazing graphics by Jean-Luc Bozzoli that brings the viewer traveling through space and time, full of spiritual ancient and modern symbols, but because of the profound narratives by Dr. James J. Hurtak, a very knowledgeable and spiritual scientist, the really guides you through a meditational journey of Divine Wisdom and learning. You will never repent of having this DVD and will want to watch it often!
I love the Hurtak dvds . They are very relaxing yet spiritual. This is one of my favourites. Second to "The Light Body"
